title: Is it permissible to draw Bacteria, Germs, Human Cells....? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: for out from bangladesh she says can we draw bacteria and uh germs and the likes and and human cells and the things like that there's no problem in that because what's prohibited for us to draw are things such as human form animals birds fish living things bacteria are so negligible that we don't see them especially for those who are forced to draw them due to their exams do their studies like medical doctors and and the likes and those who are studying biology you
